trans-unit.source: Represents the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) <xref uid="langword_csharp_annotation" name="annotation" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 表示 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) <xref uid="langword_csharp_annotation" name="annotation" href=""> </xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: An `annotation` element can contain one or more <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAppInfo> instances (information for applications) and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDocumentation> instances (comments or text for humans).
trans-unit.target: `annotation`元素可以包含一个或多个<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAppInfo>实例 （应用程序的信息） 和<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDocumentation>（批注或供人阅读的文本） 的实例。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDocumentation> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAppInfo>

trans-unit.source: An annotation is used to store extra information about the schema or its elements.
trans-unit.target: 批注用于存储有关架构或其元素的额外信息。

trans-unit.source: These notes are specified for human consumption, `xs:documentation`, or by software, `xs:appinfo`.
trans-unit.target: 这些说明指定以便于人们使用`xs:documentation`，或由软件， `xs:appinfo`。

trans-unit.source: Annotation can be the first element of most schema elements or anywhere under the schema element.
trans-unit.target: 批注可以是第一个元素的大多数架构元素或架构元素下的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnnotation"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the string id.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置字符串 id。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Items" name="Items" href=""></xref> collection that is used to store the <xref uid="langword_csharp_appinfo" name="appinfo" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_documentation" name="documentation" href=""></xref> child elements.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_Items" name="Items" href=""></xref>用于存储的集合<xref uid="langword_csharp_appinfo" name="appinfo" href=""></xref>和<xref uid="langword_csharp_documentation" name="documentation" href=""></xref>子元素。

trans-unit.source: An annotation can contain <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAppInfo> (information used by applications) or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDocumentation> (comments or text used by humans).
trans-unit.target: 批注可以包含<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAppInfo>（由应用程序使用的信息） 或<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDocumentation>（批注或使用人所理解的文本）。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDocumentation> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAppInfo>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectCollection"></xref> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_appinfo" name="appinfo" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_documentation" name="documentation" href=""></xref> child elements.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectCollection"></xref> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_appinfo" name="appinfo" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_documentation" name="documentation" href=""></xref> child elements.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the qualified attributes that do not belong to the schema's target namespace.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置不属于架构目标命名空间的限定的属性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that do not belong to the schema's target namespace.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref>对象不属于架构目标命名空间。
